programme.desc: The Fletchers enter three sheep into the Ashbourne Show. Training is a disaster, with Daniel the ram lamb preferring to play dead, and reputations are on the line.

programme.title: This Farming Life
programme.desc: In Shetland, Kirsty tackles her first breach birth. Stevies favourite pygmy goat Ginger struggles to give birth to twins. Raymonds cows run amok on their way to the fields and the Rodgers take young heifer Nadia to the Balmoral Show.

programme.title: Alison Hammonds Florida Unpacked
programme.desc: Alison and Aidan roll into adventure camper van-style, exploring Floridas Silver Springs, kayaking across crystal waters and going backstage at a retro drive-in.

programme.title: Mr. Malcolms List
programme.desc: In 19th-century England, a wealthy, young lady named Julia engages in courtship with Mr. Malcolm, a mysterious, wealthy suitor, unaware that he has a list of qualities required of a future wife.

programme.title: Animal Babies: First Year on Earth
programme.desc: As six animal babies approach the end of their first year, they must take on the most complex challenges of their lives. A Mountain Gorilla infant must learn the co-ordination to roam free in a tiny fragment of forest.

programme.desc: A young man with fearsome-looking scissors for hands tries to fit into suburbia and win the heart of his love.

programme.desc: During a busy time at a retail department store, various owners of a cursed dress pass it from person to person as it destroys their lives.

Maddie uses her special microscope camera to show us the marvellous moment when a tiny caterpillar hatches out of its egg, and we see three Owl butterflies emerge from their pupa and spread their wings for the first time. Then Maddie heads to a wallpaper factory to learn how a repeat pattern is designed and the different colours are printed.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: Michael McIntyre looks back over his favourite surprises and pranks from the last four series. Ed Balls, Alexander Armstrong and Carol Vorderman discuss what it was like to hand over their phone in Celebrity Send to All.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray finally snaps when Marie drives her car into his house.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Torn between his girlfriend Amy, ex-wife Joanne and Italian bombshell Stefania, Robert foolishly decides to tell Amy he met up with Joanne. Amy runs for support from Debra, who accidentally tells her about Stefania.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Without the Ski Trip
programme.desc: Ross and Rachel have been fighting for the groups attention since the break up. Rachel invites everyone except Ross to her family cabin in the mountains, but on the way to the cabin, they run out of petrol. Everyone wants to call Ross for help, but Rachel wont let them.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Hypnosis Tape
programme.desc: Phoebe is upset when her 18-year-old half-brother, Frank Jr, wants to marry his attractive home economics teacher, who is more than 25 years older than him. Elsewhere, Monica receives a tip from an admirer worth a small fortune, and a hypnosis tape intended to assist Chandler give up smoking has a rather strange effect on him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Tiny T-Shirt
programme.desc: Rachels former colleague Mark asks her out on a date. When Rachel invites Ross to her apartment, he thinks she wants to get back together, but she just wants to return his things. Later, as Rachel and Mark return from their date, Ross spies on them through the peephole of Joey and Chandlers door. Meanwhile, Monica dates a millionaire, and Joey is cast in a play and clashes with the female lead.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica inherits a beautiful dollhouse that is too elaborate to play with, so Phoebe makes her own, but it meets a sad end. Meanwhile, Joey thinks hes found his true love, and Rachels boss dates Chandler, placing her in a dangerous situation.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With a Chick and a Duck
programme.desc: When Monicas millionaire friend Pete buys a restaurant and asks Monica to be the head chef, she is faced with a difficult decision. Meanwhile, Ross makes a sacrifice for Rachel, and Joey buys Chandler an unusual pet.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The friends go to the opening night of one of Joeys plays. When Rachel finds out that Ross is bringing a date, she finds one of her own. Ross tries to convince Rachel that her date is mentally unbalanced. Meanwhile, Joeys play gets terrible reviews, but his co-star provides some comfort.

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: A cartoon rabbit, framed for a murder he did not commit, teams up with a down-and-out private eye to clear his name. This Oscar-winning combination of live action and animation is set in a mythical 1940s Hollywood where humans and cartoon characters exist side by side.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: Michael McIntyre looks back over his favourite surprises and pranks from the last four series. Ed Balls, Alexander Armstrong and Carol Vorderman discuss what it was like to hand over their phone in Celebrity Send to All.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross develops a skin growth that doctors cant identify.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Ultimate Fighting Champion
programme.desc: Monica finds herself dating a guy who wants to be the Ultimate Fighting Champion. Meanwhile, Chandler finds his male bosss attentions just a little too friendly, and the group overhear a scandalous conversation at Central Perk.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe invites everyone to stay at her massage clients beach house for the weekend. Phoebe meets someone who knows details about her family, Rachel expresses her jealousy of Ross uninhibited girlfriend, and Joey nags the friends into agreeing to play a party game that requires the participants to gradually take off items of clothing.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross is dating Rachel again but hates what he had to do to get back together, while Phoebe and her real mother, Phoebe Snr, get to know each other better. Meanwhile, Monica is badly stung by a jellyfish and has to resort to drastic measures to relieve the pain.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler and Joey lose all their furniture, Monica finds that one date with her high-school heartthrob is more than enough, and Ross plays tricks on Rachel following their break-up. Elsewhere, Phoebe is temporarily convinced that a cat is the reincarnation of her dead adoptive mother Lily.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler has a brief fling with Rachels boss Joanna which leaves him handcuffed without his trousers in her office. Meanwhile, Joey can only afford one book in an encyclopaedia set, and Monica caters a party for her mother.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Ballroom Dancing
programme.desc: Joey argues with the building superintendent Treegar and ends up having to help him practise ballroom dancing. Meanwhile, Ross and Chandler cant get out of their gym membership even though neither of them wants to exercise, and Phoebe loses her massage job for kissing a client.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys New Girlfriend
programme.desc: Chandler falls for Joeys new date, Ross discovers that the woman that he thinks hes dating actually thinks hes the babysitter, Rachels new college boyfriend steals, and Phoebe tries to re-catch a cold to improve her singing voice.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Dirty Girl
programme.desc: Phoebe and Monica decide to go into business together after they cater a funeral where the widow tries not to pay, and Ross date with the beautiful Cheryl goes awry when he kills a rat in her filthy apartment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Crosses the Line
programme.desc: Chandler finally confesses to his feelings for Kathy just after she splits up with Joey, Ross rediscovers his hopeless musical skills on the keyboard which Phoebe alone appreciates, and Chandler buys new furniture for the apartment since the robbery left them with just the canoe, chick and duck.

programme.title: Paul
programme.desc: On a pilgrimage to Americas UFO heartland, two British sci-fi geeks meet an extraterrestrial and hatch a plan to help him return to his spaceship.

programme.desc: Masked murderer Ghostface is on the loose again in this frighteningly funny entry in the iconic slasher series.

programme.title: Expedition X

programme.title: Expedition X
programme.sub-title: Civil War Ghosts in the Bay

programme.title: Expedition X
programme.desc: Phil and Jess probe the science behind geologys strangest phenomena while investigating mysterious objects flying around Mexicos tallest active volcano.

programme.title: Expedition X
programme.desc: Jess and Phil venture deep into the Ozarks to investigate a mysterious predatory beast; eyewitnesses, surveillance footage and new recordings of bone-chilling howls lead the team to a shocking revelation about the legendary creature.

programme.title: Expedition X
programme.desc: In the Yucatan, Phil and Jess investigate watery caverns believed to be portals to the Maya underworld; some say angry spirits are to blame for strange lights and bizarre animal behaviour, but the sacred cenotes hide secrets darker than any legend.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue With Freddy and Juan
programme.desc: Freddy and Juan face off at a hard rock mine spanning three elevations at 4,000 feet in the Cascades; battling impenetrable rock, the guys devise an innovative 180-foot chute featuring a spiral concentrator in their first Washington state rescue.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue With Freddy and Juan
programme.desc: With nearly forty years of mining under his belt, Freddy Dodge goes on the road to help struggling mine owners to hit the mother lode. He teams up with Juan Ibarra to overhaul washplants, introduce gold recovery techniques and transform operations.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue With Freddy and Juan
programme.desc: When Freddy and Juan get an SOS from an Oregon couples mine, they must unravel an underground mystery buried beneath a dried riverbed; facing misleading dredge tailings and a faulty homemade wash plant, the guys call in all-new tech as a final hope.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue With Freddy and Juan
programme.desc: With gold prices surging to new records, the modern-day rush is on; chasing gold fever, miners take big risks on poor ground with outdated equipment; gold recovery experts Freddy Dodge and Juan Ibarra are back, turning those pitfalls into profits.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue With Freddy and Juan
programme.desc: Two rookie miners in MT desperately need to double their gold after a disastrous start to the season.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Winter season erupts as the fleet battles brutal seas and each other. Sig and Ricks alliance shatters as Keith fights through a debilitating injury and a short-handed crew.

programme.title: Air Jaws: The Hunt for Colossus
programme.desc: A 20-foot great white breaches in New Zealand, sparking a hunt for Colossus, the flying shark who went missing 10 years ago from South Africas waters; could he still be alive and lead researchers to a secret colony of lost great whites?

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Crab fishermen risk their lives as they battle Arctic weather, brutal waves and a ticking clock for big money in this modern-day gold rush on the Bering Sea.

programme.title: Naked and Afraid Apocalypse
programme.desc: An unrelenting electrical storm pounds the wasteland for three straight days; survivalists scavenge wreckage for roofing materials and gutters to stave off flooding.; barely protected inside a car, Alexas challenge is at risk due to hypothermia.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.sub-title: Searching for World War IIs Lost Hero
programme.desc: Armed with a new eyewitness account and cutting-edge tech, Josh travels to Micronesia and dives the Pacific to find a lost P-47 Thunderbolt. Piloted by an American hero, the plane took part in a daring raid during the final days of World War II.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: As the fast-moving ice edge crushes all in its path, Sig and Mandy rush north to rejoin the fray. On the Cornelia Marie, Josh and Caseys race to save their pots comes at a cost in blood and pain. Heavy freezing spray threatens to capsize the Wizard.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Skirting the ice line to the deepest set of their careers, Josh and Casey apply frontier medicine to a bleeding deck boss.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Fishing crews on the Bering Sea endure mortal peril and intense discomfort during crab season, with 12-metre waves, 318-kilogram crab pots that can easily crush a careless crewman, and freezing temperatures around the clock.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Captains scramble to meet an expanded quota in the path of a violent system dubbed Squall-pocalypse. A breakdown on the Wizard puts Monte in debt to the Time Bandit and Josh and Casey exceed their own quota when it comes to injuries on deck.

programme.title: Buying Alaska
programme.desc: Tiffany and Roland live in Anchorage, Alaskas biggest city, but hectic city life is too much for their family. Instead, they search for a home in the wilderness.

programme.title: Buying Alaska
programme.desc: Wes and Angela own an air taxi company in Alaska. Theyre looking for a million dollar dream home, and can fly anywhere in the state to find it.

programme.desc: Mike Brewer and Marc `Elvis Priestley trade up to a VW Golf GTi for teaching assistant Jess. And the guys transform an old Fiat Doblo into a micro camper.

programme.desc: Mike Brewer and Marc `Elvis Priestley help cattle farmer Tom trade up an old Jaguar and a tractor to a DeLorean. But with a £30,000 price tag it wont be easy.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers: Dream Car
programme.desc: Car dealer supremo Mike Brewer and mechanic Marc Elvis Priestley help police officer Deepak trade up his Nissan Juke to a stylish Porsche Cayenne.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.sub-title: Home Is Where the Yurt Is
programme.desc: In the rugged Tennessee mountains, the Raneys scramble to save a family without suitable food, water and shelter. Marty constructs a massive yurt, Misty transforms a rundown pond into a food source and Matt creates a workshop with a propane forge.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: In order to save a Georgia homestead drowning in a snake and gator-invested swamp, the Raneys must find an ingenious way to reclaim the Buchannans land from the encroaching mire and all it brings with it.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: The Raneys bring some homesteading mastery to a Vermont couple who start but rarely finish big projects. Marty creates viable access through dense terrain, Misty builds an underground garden and Matt bear-proofs the homestead with ingenious builds.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: Homesteading has exploded in popularity, with families moving to more remote areas and with bigger ambition than ever before. But for the rookie off-gridder striving for self-sufficiency, extreme plans often lead to extreme problems.

programme.desc: Pineapple argues with a woman who has a hall pass from her husband; Jeremy gets in a fight, and Elmer hunts for a massive haul; TWs easy tow turns into an ordeal, while a crazy customer goes ballistic on Bridgett; Shawn makes a spooky discovery.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers World Tour
programme.desc: Mike and Elvis are going global. This time, the stakes are higher, the deadlines tighter and the motor transformations are more jaw-dropping than ever.

programme.title: Bitchin Rides
programme.sub-title: Too Late to Turn Back Now
programme.desc: After almost a year of fabrication, the team starts assembling panels into the shape of a car. The chassis is also made of aluminium. After a painstaking frame-design process, the two shapes are melded together for the first and last time.

programme.title: Naked and Afraid
programme.desc: In Mexico, four survivalists attempt to endure 21 days in the ancient Mayan jungle, where humans were once sacrificed to the gods. Battling relentless mosquitoes, torrential storms and stinging wasps, the two teams must merge into a tribe to survive.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Simple Suppers
programme.desc: Nigel Slater transforms favourite classic recipes by giving them a new twist. Whether it is a makeover for the traditional cottage pie, or an exciting new version of the time-honoured apple tart, Nigel proves that just by taking the basic principles and altering them slightly, it is easy to jazz up some of Britains most-loved dishes. Nigel also gives a new spin to beans on toast.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Simple Suppers
programme.desc: Nigel Slater demonstrates how to make ingredients go just that little bit further. Whether its adding grated beetroot to make a tasty meatball supper feed the masses, or putting the spotlight on a small garden harvest to make a sensuous pudding, Nigels clever tricks and inspired ideas show that you can often make bountiful feasts with apparently few ingredients.

programme.title: Jamies Great Britain
programme.desc: Jamie travels to Yorkshire, uncovering how the Industrial Revolution, and the need for immigrant workers, changed everything from the people on our streets to the food on our plates. Jamie starts at the Kings Arms pub in the village of Heath where huge Yorkshire puddings are washed down with pints of ale. In Leeds, home to the third-largest Jewish community in Britain, Jamie samples chicken soup and smoked fish.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James returns home to his native Yorkshire, where he is joined by good friend and multi award-winning chef Brian Turner. James visits top chef Frances Atkins beautiful restaurant the Yorke Arms, where he enjoys her signature dish al fresco, in her unusual dining room the Onion. Brian tastes the delights of some Yorkshire charcuterie, and later they both take time out, where James brushes up his clay pigeon skills and Brian is challenged to some off-road driving.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James visits the stunning Lake District, where he is joined by top Michelin-starred chef Clare Smyth. James visits Clares meat suppliers the Lake District Farmers, while Clare learns the secret of the Lake Districts famous sticky toffee pudding. They both visit the Windermere Jetty Museum, and are treated to a trip out on Lake Windermere on a traditional steam-powered boat.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: `The Great British Bake Off makes its debut on Channel 4 as the series returns for an eighth season with 12 budding bakers competing to be crowned the champion. Established judge Paul Hollywood is joined by food connoisseur Prue Leith, while seasoned entertainers Sandi Toksvig and Noel Fielding take on the role of being the shows hosts. Despite the change in personnel, the key Bake Off traditions remain intact, as the contestants try to impress the panel with a fine selection of beautifully-crafted and delicious cakes, tarts, breads and more.

programme.title: James Martins American Adventure

Famous for its sugar production, the area boasts beautiful plantation houses that are rich in history. James arrives in style in a red Mustang and visits historic Houmas House, where he cooks in the houses beautiful gardens, before sampling the local speciality of gumbo at the hands of the houses resident chef.

programme.title: James Martins American Adventure
programme.desc: James Martins American Adventure continues with a drive towards Louisianas swamplands, where he ditches his car for a high-speed boat! The unique watery wonderland provides James with the perfect location to cook a stunning recipe. All he has to do is make sure that he avoids the alligators! James also discovers nearby Lafayette, a city with a great foodie legacy, where he visits family-run smokehouse Johnsons Boucaniere.

programme.title: James Martins American Adventure
programme.desc: James continues with a trip to an island thats not actually an island. Avery Island is a large salt mound and the home of the chili peppers that are used to make Tabasco sauce. James meets the family who farm the peppers, make the sauce and run the Tabasco company, and hes even granted access to the pepper fields to cook two amazing dishes.

programme.title: Classic Movies: The Story Of
programme.sub-title: Classic Movies: The Life And Death Of Colonel Blimp
programme.desc: In search of the cinematically sublime, Ian Nathan tells the story of films that have entered the pantheon of greats. Exploring their legacy with detail and affection, he reflects on their trials and triumphs and looks for the truth behind the myths.

programme.title: Paul Simon: Live at Webster Hall, New York
programme.desc: Paul Simon and his 8-piece band perform his classics at Webster Hall in New York.

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.sub-title: Adjoa Andoh, Cat Burns, Clara Amfo
programme.desc: Adjoa Andoh, Cat Burns, Clara Amfo: The artists are challenged to capture on canvas the portrait of one of three celebrity sitters.

programme.title: Classic Albums
programme.sub-title: Meat Loaf: Bat Out of Hell
programme.desc: Engineers, musicians and the man himself reveal how this rock opera was created. Crashing guitars, powerful vocals and sweat combined to make music history.

programme.title: Classic Albums
programme.desc: Film revealing how the King created his seminal debut. Sam Phillips, Keith Richards and BB King are among those discussing the album and its far-reaching influence.

programme.title: Elvis Presley: The Early Years
programme.desc: Uncover Elvis Presleys journey from Tupelos poverty to worldwide fame. Through highs and lows, witness the rise of the King, a tale of passion, perseverance, and the birth of rock and roll.

programme.title: Elvis: Summer of 56
programme.desc: Documentary capturing the pivotal year in Elviss journey to rock `n roll fame. Featuring his controversial TV appearances, spectacular performances, newsreel clips and interviews.

programme.title: When Elvis Met Priscilla
programme.desc: It was a classic tale of boy meets girl, but in this case, the boy was the most famous star in the world. Elvis and Priscillas journey is one imbued with love but also controversy and turbulence. This is the story of when Elvis met Priscilla.

programme.title: Roy Orbison Forever
programme.desc: Offering extraordinary insight, Roy Orbison deep dives into what made his music a cultural driving force through a series of interviews collected over several years.

programme.title: Classic Albums
programme.desc: The Who give a first-hand insight into the making of their 20th century masterpiece, `Whos Next, as well as discussing its far reaching influence.

programme.title: Johnson and Knopflers Music Legends
programme.desc: Brian and Mark head to Nashville, Tennessee, to meet up with Marks longtime friend and sometime collaborator, Emmylou Harris, who shares her career highlights and discusses her relationship with legendary country rock pioneer Gram Parsons. Along the way, the trio are joined for a jam session with country music guitarist Vince Gill.

programme.title: Discovering Music
programme.desc: Music critics and fans look back at the 30-year career of progressive rockers Pink Floyd, famed for their hugely successful concept albums and elaborate live shows.

programme.title: David Harewoods F Word
programme.desc: Actor David Harewood heads to LA to talk to a few of his famous friends about how the road to Hollywood stardom is often a bumpy one strewn with rejection, disappointment and setbacks.

programme.title: Auction
programme.desc: Artworks by Boudin, Matisse, Dali and and Monet go on offer at Christies, as does Paul Gauguins Te Fare, which is expected to fetch up to £18million.

programme.title: Auction
programme.desc: After the death of John Kennedy, Jacqueline Kennedy sought comfort in her relationship with David Ormsby-Gore, later Lord Harlech. Fifty years on, the letters that passed between them have been discovered in two locked boxes at Glyn Cywarch, the Welsh house of the Harlech family.

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: Adaptation of Rodgers and Hammersteins musical set in the wartime tropics, telling the story of two love affairs in parallel. An American nurse falls in love with a local widowed planter who is many years her senior, has children of his own and is very set in his ways. Meanwhile, a young Marine falls for a local native girl.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Star-studded sinister and amusing stories, each with a twist in the tale.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: An assassin accepts the hospitality of an intended victim.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A man invents a machine which enables him to talk to plants, but the results are more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.sub-title: Never Speak Ill of the Dead
programme.desc: Two men are convinced that a doctor has buried his wife in the cellar.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Harrys integrity and hard work have earned him a promotion at the bank. Despite his immaculate accounts, Harry is accused of embezzlement. Is his honesty too good to be true?

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: After serving a prison sentence, a man (Bradford Dillman) courts the woman (Barbara Barrie) whose testimony convicted him.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: A man (Peter Lind Hayes) mysteriously disappears after hinting of marital troubles to a curious neighbour (Lillian Gish).

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Lord Ned Stark arrives at Kings Landing, and before he can shake off the dust of the road, his presence is requested by the Small Council. On his way through the Red Keep, Ned sees Sir Jaime Lannister standing by the Iron Throne. The two men exchange barbs, and then Jaime recounts the day that the Mad King Aerys murdered Neds father and brother in the throne room.

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming heads to Merseyside on a voyage of discovery in Liverpool. His journey takes him from a recording studio hidden in a bar to Britains swankiest toilets.

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming returns to London as he walks from one iconic market to another, ambling from Smithfields to Spitalfields where he meets fellow actor Larry Lamb.

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Richard E Grant visits more of the worlds most ostentatious, scandalous and exclusive hotels, beginning in Miami.

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor visits Hong Kongs most extravagant hotels, including the Four Seasons and the Ritz-Carlton, home to the worlds highest swimming pool.

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Richard E Grant looks at the secrets of hotels.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: At his familys war camp, Lord Tywin Lannister butchers a stag and discusses their houses situation with his son Jaime Lannister, who reads Lord Ned Starks order for Tywin to appear at court. The patriarch reprimands his son for attacking Ned in the streets and explains how important it is to free Tyrion from the Eyrie: `Every day that he remains a prisoner, the less our name commands respect.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: After the capture of Ned, Syrio and Arya confront Lannister guards whilst Cersei uses all the power of manipulation on Sansa.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In the black cells of the Red Keep, Lord Ned Stark wastes away in the darkness. Lord Varys visits the accused traitor to say that his own loyalties are to the people of the realm. Varys wants to avoid the way that Robb Stark is about to wage against the Lannisters, and all devastation it will cause to innocent lives. Ned refuses to offer a false confession and capitulate to the queen who tried to murder his son.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Robb Stark finds his destiny forever changed and Catelyn confronts Jaime in the season finale.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion arrives in Kings Landing to counsel Joffrey; Stannis Baratheon plots an invasion to claim his late brothers throne; Daenerys and her three dragons search for allies and water; Bran presides over a threadbare Winterfell.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion chastens Cersei for alienating the kings subjects; Arya shares a secret with Gendry; one of Danys scouts returns with news; Theon Greyjoy reunites with his father; Davos enlists a pirate to join forces with Stannis and Melisandre.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: What Is Dead May Never Die
programme.desc: Tyrion plots to gain alliances through the promise of marriage; Catelyn arrives in the Stormlands; Luwin tries to decipher Brans dreams.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Joffrey punishes Sansa; Catelyn tries to get Stannis and Renly to unite against the Lannisters; Dany arrives at the gates of Qarth; Arya and Gendry are taken to Harrenhal; Davos must smuggle Melisandre into a secret cove.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The end of the Baratheon rivalry drives Catelyn to flee; Tyrion is alerted to Joffreys flawed defense plan; Arya receives a promise; the Nights Watch arrive at an ancient fortress.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Old Gods and the New
programme.desc: The Lannisters send Myrcella away from harm; Arya has a surprise visitor; Dany makes a vow; Robb and Catelyn receive crucial news; Jon gets a chance to prove himself.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jaime meets a relative; Dany receives an invitation to the House of the Undying; Theon leads a search party; Jon gets lost in the wilderness; Cersei counsels Sansa.

programme.title: The Iris Affair
programme.desc: Iris Nixon steals an enigmatic code from genius philanthropist Cameron Beck and disappears. A tense countdown ensues as she races to unravel the codes mystery, with Cameron in pursuit.

programme.title: Big Little Lies
programme.desc: A new arrival to an affluent suburb has deadly repercussions.

programme.title: The White Lotus
programme.desc: The exploits and misadventures of various guests and employees at a tropical resort over the course of one week.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: A flood of organised crime parolees changes the landscape of the Soprano-Lupertazzi alliance. Meanwhile, Janice continues the familys Sunday dinner tradition; Carmela and AJ commune with local wildlife, while Christopher baulks at paying the bill on a night out. Elsewhere, Tony tries to introduce his therapist, Dr Melfi, to his `other self.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony evaluates a contractors gift and later reunites with his paroled cousin, Tony Blundetto. Elsewhere, Paulie and Christopher relive some not-so-special memories, Carmela launches a film club, Adriana grapples with her guilt, and a familiar figure `crosses over.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Johnny Sack is moving quickly and ruthlessly to take over the New York mob. When bookie Lorraine Calluzzo fails to pay Johnny his share of her profits, Johnny sends one of his crew to issue a violent warning to Lorraine that shell never forget. Lorraine reaches out to Tony for help, and the boss tries to negotiate a power-sharing plan with Johnny who angrily refuses.

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An ex-hit man is injected with a mysterious cocktail of drugs by his arch-rival that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. Hurtling through a succession of sex and violence in order to keep his pulse rate up, he must seek revenge and keep himself and his girlfriend alive.

programme.title: King of Killers
programme.desc: Garan is part of a group of international hitmen who are contracted to take out the most dangerous killer in the world, only to find out that theyre the ones being hunted.

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution.

programme.title: White Elephant
programme.desc: When two cops witness an assassination attempt, a ruthless crime boss orders Gabriel Tancredi, an ex-Marine turned mob enforcer, to eliminate any and all threats.

programme.title: American Night
programme.desc: An art dealer and a ruthless New York mafia boss fight for money, power and love.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fuelled by his restored faith in humanity, and inspired by Supermans selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists newfound ally Diana Prince to face an even greater threat. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to recruit a team to stand against this newly-awakened enemy. Despite the formation of an unprecedented league of heroes in Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and the Flash, it may be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Billy Batson is a streetwise 14-year-old who can magically transform into the adult superhero Shazam simply by shouting out one word. His newfound powers soon get put to the test when he squares off against the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kravens complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: The Bricklayer
programme.desc: A rogue insurgent assassinates foreign journalists and makes it look like the CIA is responsible. Coaxed out of retirement to clear the agencys name, a deadly operative must confront his checkered past while unraveling an international conspiracy.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
programme.desc: When a powerful shape-shifting sorceress sets her eyes on Pos Staff of Wisdom, he suddenly realises hes going to need some help. Teaming up with a quick-witted corsac fox, he soon discovers that heroes can be found in the most unexpected places.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Po might just be the laziest, clumsiest panda in the Valley of Peace, but he secretly dreams of becoming a kung fu legend. When the villainous snow leopard Tai Lung threatens Pos homeland, the hapless panda is chosen to fulfil an ancient prophecy and defend the Valley from attack. Training under Master Shifu, Po embarks on an epic high-kicking adventure as he sets out to thwart Tai Lungs evil plans. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po must unlock secrets of his past in order to defeat a formidable villain who plans to wipe out kung fu and conquer China. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: After reuniting with his long-lost father, Po must train a village of clumsy pandas to help him defeat a supernatural warrior who becomes stronger with each battle.

programme.desc: Po might just be the laziest, clumsiest panda in the Valley of Peace, but he secretly dreams of becoming a kung fu legend. When the villainous snow leopard Tai Lung threatens Pos homeland, the hapless panda is chosen to fulfil an ancient prophecy and defend the Valley from attack. Training under Master Shifu, Po embarks on an epic high-kicking adventure as he sets out to thwart Tai Lungs evil plans. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po must unlock secrets of his past in order to defeat a formidable villain who plans to wipe out kung fu and conquer China. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: Jenna is desperate for acceptance at school. After wishing that she was older, she wakes up with a job, a flat and a boyfriend, but is being 30 all its cracked up to be? Jenna discovers she isnt the person she thought shed be when she grew up.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss; she cant remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that hes in it for love.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donnas pregnant daughter reunites with her mothers old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie is given another makeover to become the face of the Bureau, prior to embarking on a promotional tour. When two of her friends are kidnapped - Miss USA and a beauty pageant director - she decides to investigate on her own, in defiance of orders to the contrary.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: Rent
programme.desc: Artists, junkies and misfits in New Yorks East Village struggle with poverty, illness and the Aids epidemic.

programme.title: The Blind Side
programme.desc: Michael Oher is a poor and undereducated African-American teenager who lived all his life on the streets. His tremendous size and quickness makes him a perfect athlete and attracts the interest if a wealthy and conservative suburban family who take him in and groom him both athletically and academically.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: A conflicted Navy pilot and veteran of the Second World War questions the role he is forced to play when he is called back into service for the Korean War.

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: After discovering that he can travel through time, a young man uses his ability to win the woman of his dreams and save his friend from professional disaster.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: A glamorous career woman loses control when her married lover, a Manhattan attorney, ends their brief affair. Unable to accept his rejection, she pursues him at the office, and then at his home, eventually drawing his wife and daughter into the confrontation.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: Whimsical but engaging western about a drifter who saves a woman from a gang of marauders. The cowboy is astonished to learn that the woman is a nun, especially when he witnesses her heavy drinking and cigar-smoking ways. The unlikely pair embark on a voyage of discovery as they become embroiled in the Mexican War.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A soldier returns from Vietnam to find his boyhood friend, also a fellow soldier, in a military hospital, having suffered a mental breakdown in which he has become detached from reality and imagines that he is a bird.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: The cynical commander of Allied Nations forces has to prevent a warlord from taking over the world. With 63 hostages held in his seemingly impregnable fortress, the warlord is demanding an outrageously hefty ransom.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hairs-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old mans notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A pair of transit policemen decide to raid a New York subway train loaded with money. Foster brothers John and Charlie have held a lifelong fantasy of robbing the networks money train, which collects millions of dollars each night from the citys subway stations. In addition to trying to deceive their boss, the boys must also contend with a beautiful new decoy cop.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. Theres trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. Theres trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: A glamorous career woman loses control when her married lover, a Manhattan attorney, ends their brief affair. Unable to accept his rejection, she pursues him at the office, and then at his home, eventually drawing his wife and daughter into the confrontation.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: Whimsical but engaging western about a drifter who saves a woman from a gang of marauders. The cowboy is astonished to learn that the woman is a nun, especially when he witnesses her heavy drinking and cigar-smoking ways. The unlikely pair embark on a voyage of discovery as they become embroiled in the Mexican War.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A soldier returns from Vietnam to find his boyhood friend, also a fellow soldier, in a military hospital, having suffered a mental breakdown in which he has become detached from reality and imagines that he is a bird.

Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. Theres trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville has been haunting the grounds of his country estate for more than 300 years, but he soon meets his match when he tries to scare off a modern-day American family that just moved in.

programme.title: Little Vampire
programme.desc: A friendship forms between a never-aging 10-year-old vampire and an orphan schoolboy, but a moon-headed monster throws obstacles in their paths.

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: In this version of the classic story - based on the smash Broadway musical - Dorothy is a shy 24-year-old Harlem kindergarten teacher who is brought by a snowstorm to the mysterious Land of Oz, a sprawling, decaying, nightmarish, and dangerous megalopolis that resembles the physical characteristics of New York City.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with plans for a fun-filled summer voyage on a monster cruise. As the pack starts enjoying colossal buffets and exotic excursions, Drac finds himself falling for the ships intriguing but dangerous captain. He soon learns that trying to balance family, friends and romance might just be too much to handle. even for the worlds most powerful vampire.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Looking for the days when he felt like a `real ogre, shrek makes an ill advised pact with Rumpelstiltskin. Banished to a Shrek-less version of the land of Far Far Away, the unfortunate ogre must once again win the love of Princess Fiona if hes to ever get back home.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Escape From the 21st Century
programme.desc: Three friends discover they have the power to travel back and forth twenty years with a sneeze. The future is not as good as they hoped, and they need to take on the responsibility of saving the world.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Set in the near future, the film chronicles the odyssey of 30 young men and women who are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is whats outside the ship or who theyre becoming inside it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Escape From the 21st Century
programme.desc: Three friends discover they have the power to travel back and forth twenty years with a sneeze. The future is not as good as they hoped, and they need to take on the responsibility of saving the world.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: In the year 2012, scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal. Only one man survives, virologist Robert Neville. He has two aims: find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A.I.: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Futuristic version of the fairy tale `Pinocchio, about a highly advanced robotic child who longs to become a real boy so he can win back the love of his adoptive mother who abandoned him. He journeys through a violent, dystopian world in a quest for the Blue Fairy who has the power to make his dream come true.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Escape From the 21st Century
programme.desc: Three friends discover they have the power to travel back and forth twenty years with a sneeze. The future is not as good as they hoped, and they need to take on the responsibility of saving the world.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the towns children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A possessed doll that was purchased for their new born child creates havoc, and destroys a young couples lives.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Years after the tragic death of their daughter, a former toy maker and his wife welcome a nun and six orphaned girls into their farmhouse. Terror soon strikes when one child finds a seemingly innocent doll that appears to have a life of its own.

programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.desc: A small group of survivors try to stay a step ahead of the vicious, virus-infected humans that have overrun London.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Greedy People
programme.desc: Residents of a small island town navigate a murder and the discovery of a million dollars, a series of increasingly bad decisions upend the once peaceful community.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the presidents bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: An international hit man and quick-change artist is hired by a secret organisation to assassinate Charles de Gaulle.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the worlds population.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his familys killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins are asked to deliver a precious package to Madame Au Lait and decide that a ride with Pufferty is safest way to transport it. However, when Hopparoo challenges the lovable dog train to a race, the package bounces out of the carriage and embarks upon a crazy journey round Tickety Town, with Tommy and Tallulah in hot pursuit.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tickety Town is covered in fallen leaves, so Tommy and Tallulah are using McCogginss new prototype street sweeper to clear them. However, in their eagerness to speed things up, they go against his instructions and press the turbo button. Suddenly, the sweeper goes haywire, rampaging through town and sucking up anything in its path, including Madame Au Laits clock key and very nearly Hopparoo too.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The whole town gathers to take part in McCoggins treasure hunt. Whoever finds the most cogs will be the winner. Knowing that McCoggins hides the cogs in the same places every year, Tommy and Tallulah are cruising to victory, until they realise that a quick win will spoil everyones day, but when they borrow McCoggins special clockwork rollerskates to put the cogs back, the skates zoom out of control.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins decide that everyone must get active and turn Tickety town into a boot camp. With Tommy banging his drum and Tallulah blowing on her trumpet, soon everyone is lifting, running, puffing and panting. They are all so exhausted that they fall fast asleep, but with Chime Time imminent, they must find a way to wake up Puffertys wheels.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: When Hopparoo bursts all their bubbles with his sharp ears, the twins use McCoggins extra-strong bubble mixture instead and blow a bubble so huge that it engulfs Battersby, Madame Au Lait, McCoggins, Lopsiloo, Chikidee and finally Tommy and Tallulah themselves! Where is Hopparoo? Only his sharp ears can free them for Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah love dressing up and surprising each other with their crazy costumes, but when they decide to surprise everybody else in town too Hopparoo is not impressed. In their efforts to surprise the bunny, they give the Spring Chicks such a fright that they barricade themselves in front of the clockhouse, blocking the way to Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Madame Au Lait is teaching the twins pottery, and to inspire them she shows them a magnificent cow pot that she made on her wheel, but when she leaves them to their enthusiastic pot-making, they accidentally smash it and when they try to repair it, they only make things worse. Trying to re-create the pot is even more of a disaster. Huge quantities of clay fly from their wheel into the town, blocking Puffertys tracks.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Hopparoo is disappointed when everyone gathers for Measuring Time. He was sure hed grown more than that! Tommy and Tallulah have some crazy ideas about how to add inches, but a super-tall rabbit rampaging through town on stilts can only cause chaos.

programme.desc: Go scavenging with natures clean-up crew, as Tasmanian devils get into food fights with rivals, dung beetles roll over the competition and more.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild
programme.desc: The Lilayi Elephant Nursery near Lusaka in Zambia is home to four orphan elephants. The two oldest have been there since they were just a few months old. These boisterous babies are out-growing the nursery and it is time to move to big school.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild
programme.desc: Kinda baboons have turned their backs on the aggressive displays of dominance usually associated with these large monkeys and lead altogether more peaceful lives.

programme.title: Whale with Steve Backshall

programme.title: Whale with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve returns home to the Atlantic waters of the British Isles as he considers the question of what humanity can do to ensure the enduring future of whales, which have already survived so much.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David descends beneath the waves at night in the state of the art Triton submersible, the first of its kind to visit the reef. He meets some of the tiny coral animals that built the reef and helped to turn it into an underwater wonderland.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David continues his exploration of the Great Barrier Reef, aboard the research vessel the Alucia. He discovers the incredible animals that visit the reef every year, from birds to whales, some travelling thousands of kilometres to get there.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David examines what the next few decades hold for this remarkable community of animals, as well as what is being done to save it.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Dragons And Damsels
programme.desc: They are beautiful, their behaviours are as complex as mammals and they have existed since the dinosaurs. Join David Attenborough as he delves into the life of dragonflies and damselflies.

programme.title: Pride Rules
programme.desc: Contend with the challenges of the rainy season, which turns everything green and spoils the lions camouflage.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Conquest of the Skies
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough charts the story of animals who defy gravity, starting with the planets first flyers: the insect.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Conquest of the Skies
programme.desc: After meeting some critters who glide through life in Borneo, Sir David Attenborough decides to turn back the clock.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Conquest of the Skies
programme.desc: In the final episode in the series, Sir David Attenborough turns his attention to the creatures that dominate our skies today.

programme.title: Coastal Africa
programme.desc: This is the story of the Golden Forest, the vast expanses of kelp that lines Africas southwestern shore. Fed by an upwelling of nutrients from deep in the Atlantic, the kelp forest nurtures four distinct worlds.

programme.title: Coastal Africa
